apps.name: AltStore
apps.versionDescription:
This update fixes sideloading apps on iOS 15.

‚ö†Ô∏è If you have already updated to iOS 15, you must manually install this update by updating AltServer to the latest version and using it to re-install AltStore. You do not need to delete AltStore first.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: AltStore
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Adds "Enable JIT" context menu for active apps
‚Ä¢ Adds "Open" context menu action for active apps
‚Ä¢ Supports sideloading apps that use AltKit (such as DolphiniOS and Provenance)

IMPROVEMENTS
‚Ä¢ Asks you to deactivate an app first when installing a new app without any free app slots
‚Ä¢ Improves error message when computer date & time don't match iOS device

BUG FIXES
‚Ä¢ Fixes incorrect navigation and tab bar appearances on iOS 15
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore adds support for 3rd party sources, allowing you to download apps from other developers directly through AltStore.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
The update you've all been waiting for is here: Delta now supports playing all your favorite Nintendo DS games! ü•≥

NINTENDO DS
‚Ä¢ Adds melonDS-based core to emulate Nintendo DS games*
‚Ä¢ Supports save states, cheats, and fast forwarding
‚Ä¢¬†Access DS Home Screen to change system settings such as your nickname, favorite color, and birthday
‚Ä¢ Uses device microphone to emulate DS microphone
‚Ä¢ Simulates closing + opening DS lid by sleeping + unlocking device
‚Ä¢ Supports Just-in-time (JIT) compilation for enhanced performance on devices with A12 or later running iOS 14.2 - 14.3

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS
‚Ä¢ Dark mode support throughout entire app (thanks @ericlewis!)
‚Ä¢ Supports transparency in game artwork
‚Ä¢ "Context Menu Previews" setting to enable/disable previews when using context menus
‚Ä¢ "Import Controller Skin" button when changing controller skins

BUG FIXES
‚Ä¢ Fixes occasional audio distortion during emulation
‚Ä¢ Fixes Real Time Clock (RTC) not working for some GBA games
‚Ä¢ Fixes missing "Home Screen Shortcuts" setting on newer devices without 3D touch
‚Ä¢ Fixes crash when customizing home screen shortcuts
‚Ä¢ Fixes crash launching home screen shortcut when "Home Screen Shortcuts" settings screen is currently visible
‚Ä¢ Fixes audio stuttering when previewing games + save states
‚Ä¢ Fixes custom artwork appearing incorrectly rotated
‚Ä¢ Fixes game artwork not updating when choosing from Files
‚Ä¢ Fixes some erroneous sync errors

*Requires relevant BIOS files which can be found online and imported in Delta's Nintendo DS core settings.
apps.localizedDescription:
Delta is an all-in-one emulator for iOS. Delta builds upon the strengths of its predecessor, GBA4iOS, while expanding to include support for more game systems such as NES, SNES, and N64.

FEATURES

Supported Game Systems
‚Ä¢ Nintendo Entertainment System
‚Ä¢ Super Nintendo Entertainment System
‚Ä¢ Nintendo 64
‚Ä¢ Game Boy (Color)
‚Ä¢ Game Boy Advance
‚Ä¢ Nintendo DS
‚Ä¢ And plenty more to come!

Controller Support
‚Ä¢ Supports PS4, PS5, Xbox One S, Xbox Series X, and MFi game controllers.
‚Ä¢ Supports bluetooth (and wired) keyboards, as well as the Apple Smart Keyboard.
‚Ä¢ Completely customize button mappings on a per-system, per-controller basis.
‚Ä¢ Map buttons to special ‚ÄúQuick Save‚Äù, ‚ÄúQuick Load,‚Äù and ‚ÄúFast Forward‚Äù actions.

Save States
‚Ä¢ Save and load save states for any game from the pause menu.
‚Ä¢ Lock save states to prevent them from being accidentally overwritten.
‚Ä¢ Automatically makes backup save states to ensure you never lose your progress.
‚Ä¢ Support for ‚ÄúQuick Saves,‚Äù save states that can be quickly saved/loaded with a single button press (requires external controller).

Cheats
‚Ä¢ Supports various types of cheat codes for each supported system:
‚Ä¢ NES: Game Genie
‚Ä¢ SNES: Game Genie, Pro Action Replay
‚Ä¢ N64: GameShark
‚Ä¢ GBC: Game Genie, GameShark
‚Ä¢ GBA: Action Replay, Code Breaker, GameShark
‚Ä¢ DS: Action Replay

Delta Sync
‚Ä¢ Sync your games, game saves, save states, cheats, controller skins, and controller mappings between devices.
‚Ä¢ View version histories of everything you sync and optionally restore them to earlier versions.
‚Ä¢ Supports both Google Drive and Dropbox.

Custom Controller Skins
‚Ä¢ Beautiful built-in controller skins for all systems.
‚Ä¢ Import controller skins made by others, or even make your own to share with the world!

Hold Button
‚Ä¢ Choose buttons for Delta to hold down on your behalf, freeing up your thumbs to press other buttons instead.
‚Ä¢ Perfect for games that typically require one button be held down constantly (ex: run button in Mario games, or the A button in Mario Kart).

Fast Forward
‚Ä¢ Speed through slower parts of games by running the game much faster than normal.
‚Ä¢ Easily enable or disable from the pause menu, or optionally with a mapped button on an external controller.

3D/Haptic Touch
‚Ä¢ Use 3D or Haptic Touch to ‚Äúpeek‚Äù at games, save states, and cheat codes.
‚Ä¢ App icon shortcuts allow quick access to your most recently played games, or optionally customize the shortcuts to always include certain games.

Game Artwork
‚Ä¢ Automatically displays appropriate box art for imported games.
‚Ä¢ Change a game‚Äôs artwork to anything you want, or select from the built-in game artwork database.

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Gyroscope support (WarioWare: Twisted! only)
‚Ä¢ Microphone support (DS only)
‚Ä¢ Support for delta:// URL scheme to jump directly into a specific game.

**Delta and AltStore LLC are in no way affiliated with Nintendo. The name "Nintendo" and all associated game console names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.**

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
**DELTA 1.3 RELEASE CANDIDATE**

IMPROVEMENTS
‚Ä¢ Updates DS portrait controller skin with bigger buttons
‚Ä¢ Updates Licenses screen to include melonDS and Genesis Plus GX
‚Ä¢ Supports custom game artwork with transparent backgrounds

BUG FIXES
‚Ä¢ Fixes custom artwork appearing incorrectly rotated
‚Ä¢ Fixes game artwork not updating when choosing from Files
‚Ä¢ Fixes crash when playing DS games and another app is using the microphone
‚Ä¢ Fixes some erroneous sync errors

Thanks to all your feedback, Delta 1.3 is finally just about ready for public release ü•≥ We plan to release the update to everyone soon once we've made sure there are no major bugs left to fix, so PLEASE report any and all final bugs you find while testing this release candidate üôè
apps.localizedDescription:
The next consoles for Delta are coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing Nintendo DS and Sega Genesis games!

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

‚Ä¢ Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
‚Ä¢ Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
‚Ä¢ Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
This update adds a Custom Keyboard app extension for quick access to clippings when editing text.

To enable the keyboard, go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards > Add New Keyboard... and add "ClipBoard". Once added, make sure to then enable "Allow Full Access" for ClipBoard so it can access your clippings.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!
